column3: “Had an amazing time with this strain, one of the best strains I've had so far and is an absolute favorite of mine. Makes you super fucking happy, it's almost impossible not to be in an extremely good mood, even in the midst of Armageddon, this strain does not compromise”

“Amazing sativa. Gives you the perfect uplifting high and doesn't stop you from continuing your day. Hardly made me feel sleepy or groggy after my high went down so its a perfect morning/day time strain. Smell is light and earthy, similar to the taste.”
“Probably one of the funniest highs I've had. Incredibly potent, and while its a bit short lasting it does tend to come in waves.”
“This was deffs one of the best strains I've had. I had smoked a Jay of trainwreck and then another Jay of This, and I could feel the effects good. It's strong, taste sweet and smooth.”

“Super Sour Skunk (Clone)
Looks: Bright green,slightly leafy bud with nice trich coverage, red hairs poke out much like ECSD, nothing crazy,but pretty.
Smell: This is what sold me, i feel like skunk strains have gotten lost in the mix because of kush and diesel being so popular. Well ive always felt like skunk was a kind of diesel (pine/chem/sour/skunk), and by crossin super skunk with ECSD they created  a undeniable ...”
“heavy body high for me, super fucking happy, not too hungry but i def had some snacks, super good for watching a funny movie in bed cuddled up to ur pet 🙏🏽”
“Such a fun strain, the comedown is super mellow, making it a good daytime strain. The smell is so so strong and the flavor is pungent and citrusy. The nugs are fluffy and covered in trichomes”
“I love strains that are true to their name. super sour taste and smell. great upbeat motivational effect. hands down my favorite I've tried and can't find.”
“Very potent but unfortunately not very long-lasting. Sweet at first, and then turns into an almost semen-like taste.”
“long lasting effects, immediate pain relief. great flavor and aroma. on my list as number 4 favorite”
“Amazing! Great for PTSD and related symptoms. It was almost impossible to be stressed or sad.”
“Sss looks and tastes amazing. Has a nice 🍋 and citrus flavor.”
“Such a fun strain, the comedown is super mellow, making it a good daytime strain. The smell is so so strong and the flavor is pungent and citrusy. The nugs are fluffy and covered in trichomes”

“Beautiful greens and even dark purples deep in the buds. Lots of little trichomes make the bud glisten. The smoke is mellow and smooth. Taste is fair. Nothing out of this world though. The high is mellow and I think for myself I could smoke a good 1.5 G king size and be perfect. Maybe this batch is better for novice smokers. I like more punch/kick/flooring meds. lol Just my opinion as of now. The bud is still beautif...”
“Very nice hybrid. All around solid smoke and high.”

“My cuz got this hook up dude and he did hey man try this it's called like super skunk. We all had a great fucking time. I'm guessing it was this strain should've taken a pic. I would definitely smoke it again.”
“I really like this strain very smooth and has a very nice high I can can smoke this all-day”

“Great strain. Definitely will lift ANY mood. Whenever i have some SSS i cant stop smiling, laughing an being all around happy. Great for Depression, ADHD, PTSD, etc. IMO, this strain is a daytime strain. A few tokes and im on cloud 9. And for a strain with a lower THC content (roughly 15%), it packs a powerful punch. Keep in mind that THC doesn't always determine the potency, as Marijuana is made of a recipe of chemi...”
“pretty decent strain, made me talk my ear off. id suggest this for a chill night with some buddies or even just hanging out by yourself”

“Like another reviewer said I have never been so happy in my life it was my very first medical bud was combined in a pre-roll with DH it took me all this time to figure out what SSSDH was. Now I will  spend the rest of my life looking for the genetics because I refuse to grow unless Sss. I won't  grow but for this one strain I would. Wish me a quick blessed finding of the Sss again it was July 14 2015”

“Super Sour Skunk has everything I look for in a Sativa Hybrid. The aroma of the buds is incredible. Rich sour citrus undercut with fuel and musky skunk fills your nostrils and makes your mouth water. 
The smoke is a little more dominant on the diesel side. Very rich, tingly and tasty. Quite smooth as well. Very satisfying smoke overall.
The high is everything I want in a daytime smoke. I feel very euphoric and energe...”
“A nice relaxed happy high. It's a nice sativa hybrid, that keeps you awake if you have things to do, it helps with focus, in regards to creating art, or watching a visually rich movie.”
“It's a nice mild strength strain. It hits smooth and leaves a citrus like aftertaste. Im relaxed, baked and I still feel fully functional. Good smoke.”
“Not very good.”
“Amazing strain had an ounce of it and went thru it in a week. Perfect for relaxing on the beach.”
“VERY INTENSE ALL THOUGH IT HAD A PARANOIA START TO THE FIRST INITIAL PART OF THE HIGH”
“This stuff is so 🔥10/10!!!!!!!!”

“I really like this strain. For someone who struggles with depression I found that this made me feel really happy and although my eyes were low I had a huge grin on my face the who time I was high. Tasted really nice and smoked well in both a joint and bowl.”
“I like it. It's pretty and vibrant. Very smooth. Has a deseriable after taste. I'd smoke it again :). Possibly one of my faves.”
“Great head high. Really uplifting happy high. Leaves me feeling energetic and ready to stay up all night exploring.”
“Great strain. Very good taste, fun high, killer smell.”
“My boyfriend and I loved it!”
“Amazing”
““It's a nice mild strength strain. It hits smooth and leaves a citrus like aftertaste. Im relaxed, baked and I still feel fully functional. Good smoke.””
“Incredibly uplifting high that erases migraines and liberates the mind following a couple hits. The drop off is a smooth drift into the Super Skunk indica genetics that eases you into sleep.”

“Vapourized SSS and was knocked back a bit by how strong it is! Great for relaxing and pain relief with serious couch lock.
Not my favourite but gave it a good rating as it does what it says on the tin and would recommend to anyone who likes a good movie day!”
“This stuff is loud as hell. Even bagged you can smell it down the hall. If you're trying to be low key this isn't for you, but if you don't care and want a really good clean high smoke this.”
“Citrus flavored with a hint of sweetness has an awaring high.”
“Fire bud”
“lifts my spirits so much while i'm high, but i've found i don't stay very high for long on this strain. overall a good antidepressant/anti-anxiety strain”
